title: David Moyes says West Ham have open transfer policy and alleged comments are 'wrong'
description: David Moyes says West Ham have an open transfer policy and that alleged comments made by director of player recruitment Tony Henry are "wrong".
content: Henry was suspended on Thursday while an investigation takes place into a report in the Daily Mail about comments allegedly made by Henry to other West Ham officials and agents in emails regarding the signing of African players."The comments are wrong, we were signing two players from Africa on deadline day, so I can only say they are wrong," said Moyes.Asked whether the club have an open transfer policy, Moyes replied: "Of course we do. You can see the players we sign, you can see the players that the club has signed over the years."We always sign good quality players, the best players we can get who are available to us, and it doesn't really matter where they're from to me at all."More to follow...
